instruction: Give an example of when this might be used.
output: AI-driven customer support can be used to provide customers with 24/7 assistance, even though there may be no human customer service representatives available. For example, a customer might have issues with their account on a website or need to know something about a product or service. AI-driven customer support can be used to quickly and accurately provide fast, intelligent customer service that is tailored to the customer's individual needs.
